entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
